name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Great, another bright-eyed traveler. What do you need? I've got my hands full making sure this village doesn't fall apart, but I guess I can spare a moment. Need any armor repairs or perhaps a weapon upgrade? Just don’t expect a discount for being new.

name: Haus, the blacksmith
text: Didn't you just say that? Guess you've got a short memory or you're trying to pull a fast one on me. Anyway, I'm Haus, the blacksmith. If you've got gear needing some old-fashioned tough love—or a bit of sarcasm to go with it—I'm your guy.
